page.title: 12EMPLOYMENT, BLEASDALE
page.content: Of the 77 adults in the 28 families studied in the area, 27 are farmers and 16 are farmer's wives actively engaged in running farms with their husbands. Thus 56% of the adult population is engaged in farming. 5 adults are employed as estate workers. 5 adults are housewives. 3 adults are unemployed. 4 adults are retired. 17 are employed in other work namely: 1 bank clerk,1 in the catering industry, 1 in a children's home, 2 contractors,1 cheese maker,1 school welfare worker,1 builder,1 P.O./shop- keeper,1 haulage contractor, 2 students,1 dentist,1 storeman, 1 agriculturalist and 2 domestic workers.
